mapper.insert: insert into calendar(mid, cdcode, cdname) values(#{mid}, #{cdcode}, #{cdname})
mapper.select: select nvl(max(cdcode),'CD00000') from calendar where mid = #{mid}
select distinct cdcode, cdname from calendar where mid = #{mid} order by cdcode
mapper.insert: insert into schedule(mid, cdcode, tdcode) values(#{mid},#{cdcode},#{tdcode})
mapper.select: select * from schedule where mid = #{mid} and cdcode = #{cdcode}
